definition: house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)

sentences.english: Engine room machinery and equipment, electrical and automatic machinery.
sentences.chinese: 机房机械设备，电器及自动化机械。

sentences.english: Provides a weekly report of any plant or equipment witch is Out Of Order and the action taken.
sentences.chinese: 提供发生故障的机房或设备的周报告以及采取的行动。

sentences.english: Make use of campus services like the health center and computer labs.
sentences.chinese: 利用好校园的各种服务，比如校园医护中心和微机房。

sentences.english: In 1, the top of the plant room in direct sunlight, poor ventilation.
sentences.chinese: 机房在厂房的最顶层阳光直照，通风不良。

sentences.english: Behind the teaching building is the playground. The computer room is next to it.
sentences.chinese: 教教楼后是操场，计算机房挨灭它。

sentences.english: The article discussed the lightning proof design of hydrogen make machine room mainly .
sentences.chinese: 重点论术了制氢机房的雷电防护设计。

sentences.english: The cross-section of connecting tube in fan room designed to square cross section is better.
sentences.chinese: 风机房连接风道断面型式采用方形效果较好。

sentences.english: Sign up for computer lab, incubators, projector, and digital camera.
sentences.chinese: 确定计算机房，孵卵器，幻灯机和数码相机等设备。

sentences.english: Thus, the problem of heavy system maintenance can be solved.
sentences.chinese: 从而有效地解决了机房繁重的系统维护工作。

sentences.english: It can not be too far away from the communications room.
sentences.chinese: 且具通信机房不能太远。

sentences.english: The turbine is then installed in an external housing, containing the coils.
sentences.chinese: 涡轮被安装在一个外部的机房，里面放着线圈。

sentences.english: Modern libraries also have xerox rooms, and computer rooms.
sentences.chinese: 现代图书馆也有影印室，和计算机房的。

sentences.english: The analysis on the machine room, return air and water system designing has been carried out.
sentences.chinese: 对于机房设置，回风系统和水系统设计进行了分析。

sentences.english: Secure the safety of the equipments and fittings in the telecom room.
sentences.chinese: 应对放置在机房内的设备提供安全保障。

sentences.english: This paper intro-duce the implementation of security at the client port of the computer room management system.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了一个机房管理系统客户端安全性的实现。

sentences.english: Well, the main difficulty for me is getting time on the computers in the computer room.
sentences.chinese: 对我来说最难的是很难有时间去机房上机。
